title: Kinesis to Timestream using EventBridge Pipes
description: This pattern demostrates the process of ingesting data into Amazon Timestream from Kinesis Streams via EventBridge Pipes.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project demostrates how to send data to Amazon Timestream directly from Kinesis. This pattern uses EventBridge Pipes to connect Kinesis and Timestream together.
The pattern creates a Kinesis stream, Timestream table, SQS DLQ, Cloudwatch LogGroup, IAM Policy and an EventBridge Pipe.

bullets.text: Mapping Kinesis record to Timestream data model

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
Delete the stack: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name STACK_NAME.
